1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Term
4  ( -- * Term name
5    TermName, TermName2, TermName3,
6    TermName4, TermName5, TermName6,
7    TermPath, SignedTermName,
8    showTermName, showTermPath,
9
10    -- * Term
11    Term, term,
12
13    -- * Present or new term
14    termP, termN, termPN,
15    termsP, termsN, termsPN,
16  ) where
17
18
19-- ----------------------  Term name
20
21-- | Name of term, e.g., @\"file\"@ for the term name @\/file@.
22type TermName    = String
23type TermName2   = (String, String)
24type TermName3   = (String, String, String)
25type TermName4   = (String, String, String, String)
26type TermName5   = (String, String, String, String, String)
27type TermName6   = (String, String, String, String, String, String)
28
29-- | Path of term names, e.g., term name @\/r\/x@
30--   is correspond to path @[\"r\", \"x\"]@.
31type TermPath    = [TermName]
32
33type SignedTermName = (Ordering, TermName)
34
35showTermName :: TermName -> String
36showTermName n = '/' : n
37
38showTermPath :: TermPath -> String
39showTermPath = concat . map showTermName
40
41
42-- ----------------------  Term
43
44type Term c      = (TermName, c)
45
46term :: TermName -> c -> Term c
47term n c = (n, c)
48
49
50-- ----------------------  Present or new term
51
52-- | Check present term.
53termP :: Int -> Bool
54termP = (>= 0)
55
56-- | Check new term.
57termN :: Int -> Bool
58termN = (< 0)
59
60termPN :: Int -> Int -> Bool
61termPN p n = termP p && termN n
62
63termsP :: [Int] -> Bool
64termsP = all termP
65
66termsN :: [Int] -> Bool
67termsN = all termN
68
69termsPN :: [Int] -> [Int] -> Bool
70termsPN ps ns = termsP ps && termsN ns
71
